website_summaries.verdict: A single feeding solution for the entire pack, this is a great choice if you have multiple dogs of varying ages, breeds, or sizes who don't have any issues with healthy grains.
pros: Specifically formulated by vets to meet the nutritional requirements of all dogs, eliminating the need to purchase separate foods for different ages/sizes
Complete with probiotics for digestive health, antioxidants to boost immune systems, and fatty acids for healthy skin and coats
Free from corn, wheat, and soy
cons: Although it contains healthy grains, the content is somewhat high, and dogs with grain sensitivities may not be able to tolerate it

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: For a fairly expensive brand of dog food, this particular food has had dismal performance with my dogs. I have an older dog and a young dog, neither one are finicky. I mixed the food half and half with their old food just to change the type of protein. After a few days of diarrhea, they ate the mixture with no apparent problem. However, when the mixture ended and they started on the pure CANIDAE, they stopped eating it and lost quite a bit of weight. I have tried this food twice with similar results (just to make sure it wasn't a bad batch). I can't say it is a bad food, it is just bad for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Book MavenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: She is 80# and has sensitive stomach seems something amiss as it looked like the kibble size changed recently
customer_reviews.text: been ordering Canidae for our American Bulldog mix for a couple of years. She is 80# and has sensitive stomach seems something amiss as it looked like the kibble size changed recently, then our girl started puking after a couple of weeks on a new bag. Went away recently after starting a new bag. Will be switching back to TOTW. Too many reviews stating the same. No alert from the company as I'm sure they have received complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiDano

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After feeding my dogs 3/4 of this bag I found this moldy wet clump at the bottom. I knew something had to be wrong when they would go a whole day without touching the food. I tricked them into eating it by mixing it with a wet food. Now I feel horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jasper

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY, POSION FOR DOGS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this brand because the reviews were half and half. I wanted to change my dogs food and this looked good to change from. I WAS WRONG!!!! I only mixed in a little bit to adjust them to change of their food. That same day all my dogs had stomach problems, diarrhea BAD!!! IT SMELLED SO BAD. THIS IS NOT GOOD DOG FOOD. I SWITCHED TO LOTUS AND THEIR STOMACH WENT BACK TO NORMAL SHORTLY AFTER. IT ALSO WENT AWAY QUICKER BECAUSE I GAVE THEM SOMETHING FOR THE DIARRHEA. DONT BUY THIS. IT NEEDS TO BE RECALLED.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Too much ground meal in bag
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this several times but this time the bag was probably 1/4 ground up meal instead of kibble. Since I have ordered it and this is the first time I have had this happen I will try again but if I receive another bag like this one, I will be asking for a refund and switching to another brand. You need to have some quality control here.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Want diarrhea?
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! My dog has been licking paws like crazy, refusing to eat and has diarrhea. One of my other dogs had diarrhea. Took dog in for x-ray and blood work. No issues. Dawned on me I recently bought this food and noticed a color change. Came here took at reviews and they are saying the same thing. Either avoid Canidae all together or there is something up with the food sold by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Leftontheinside

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! Made my dog (and many others) sick.
customer_reviews.text: Like others, my dog was getting sick a lot and refusing to eat. I kept thinking he had eaten some human food that didn’t agree with him (I have two small kids), and giving him sweet potato to settle his belly, only to have it happen again. I finally figured out that it was this food. He loves this food when I buy it at the pet store, but I had stocked up on Amazon because of the pandemic. I went back to the pet store for a fresh bag yesterday, and he ate it right away and is back to his normal self. I will never be purchasing here again! I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: There is something very wrong with this batch of food
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a bad batch of dog food. After feeding this new delivery of food, my dog became suddenly very ill and died . Other people have postes the same symptoms suddenly brought on after this same time frame of batch of this dog food. Their dogs have also died from those symptoms. I am extremely sad. My dog was too young to die and so suddenly. Would have given 0 stars but review won't allow.
customer_reviews.author: Faulks

customer_reviews.title: Quality is a hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I started buying this brand at the pet store because of its high recommendations. My golden-lab loves it and her coat is so soft. I decided to try buying from amazon because It is cheaper and more convenient. I found it strange that my dog ignored her food. As I’m putting her food in the storage container I notice a hole in the bottom of the bag... it broke open during shopping. I’ll stick to buying from the pet store. So not worth having to repackage and ship back the large bag to return. Something about the quality is a hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Mayanne Kim

customer_reviews.title: In the past great, but recent bag made my dog sick.
customer_reviews.text: I have fed my dog this food for over 10 years without a problem. The most recent bag I got from Amazon made him sick. Every time he ate even a little, he threw up, but he had no problem tolerating other food and was otherwise healthy. From reading other reviews, it doesn't seem like this is an isolated incident. I tried to contact customer service but the automated assistant wouldn't let me to a real person because it was past the return date. This is a real issue, and it's not the first bag this has happened with. I had to throw out a 65 dollar bag of food and switch to a new brand. Proceed with caution!
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: Rough on the bowels
customer_reviews.text: This dog food gave my dogs the most horrible gas and diarrhea. I didn’t give up right away, but after 3 weeks of liquid poop and vile farts I went back to my old dog food. Not sure what is in the dog food to induce such a negative bowel reaction but it wasn’t getting any better the longer they were on it. Never has a dog food switch caused such a malodorous reaction and I have never had my dog wake me up at night due to noxious odors.
customer_reviews.author: Ciana cloe

customer_reviews.title: This one gave my dog terrible gas.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this before going to an even more expensive lamb and rice food. This one gave my dog terrible gas. Then switched to Blue Buffalo which gave him diarrhea. I even mixed each with his original food, Rachel Ray, at little at a time. Going back to the Rachel Ray lamb and rice food. Update... it was slow getting back to just Rachel Ray Lamb and Rice but it's done and now my dog's stomach is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Believing

customer_reviews.title: Food made dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My dog always eats this food but I have never ordered it through amazon and always purchased it at the pet store. There is something not right about the bag I received. He has puked a few times since starting to eat and the color seems off. I ended up going to the pet store to rebuy it. I will never order this through amazon again. Wish I would have read the reviews earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Replica canidae
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my dogs Candidae for over 10 plus years, this canidae food I received from amazon was not the original candida food. The pellets were different some round and darker than others. My dogs poops were runny. I called Canidae corporation to give them my feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Hardcastle

customer_reviews.title: Food is different and made my dog sick.
customer_reviews.text: The size and color of the kibbles are different from the bags I have purchased over 14 years. My dog vomited up the food, had diarrhea and did not want to eat it. This is a first. Something is wrong with the food. Not expired. Possible contaminants. Company needs to know.
customer_reviews.author: Louisejf

customer_reviews.title: Making my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Canidae for 5 years and never had an issue till this order. Like others have reported it started with loose, diarrhea stools and foul smelling flatulence. Switched to rice till it cleared and started mixing in kibble and the symptoms returned immediately. One more cycle of this and I was convinced the food is making him sick. I called Canidae and will be sending them samples to investigate. I don't know if this product is counterfeit or the batch is bad. I will not buy this size, flavor and brand through amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hesketh

customer_reviews.title: Price swing was my only complaint.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the product is fine (I don't know how to rate dog food as I don't taste it and my dogs eat anything). My only problem is I bought a 44lb bag at $54ish one time and went back to buy it again and it was $72. Big swing in price so i resorted to buying it from Jet.com for under my original price. I'm a huge amazon shopper but the deal wasn't here.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Wright

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates unnecessary filler, keeps good grains in their diet!
customer_reviews.text: Great, affordable option for dogs with an allergy to chicken. This food eliminates unnecessary fillers like corn and wheat, but keeps the better quality grains in his diet. Carbohydrates are a beneficial source of caloric energy, so I prefer to keep grain in his diet! This food keeps him healthy, happy, and “regular”. We’ve been feeding this for two years now, and it’s the best value for a premium grade food with better sources of grain included.
customer_reviews.author: CRA-zy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Food makes my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: I, like others, have had my dogs with upset stomachs beyond belief since the new bag came a week or two ago. Something is wrong with this batch. My family also uses Canidae, purchased from a different retailer, different (old) packaging, and the dogs are now back on that and doing well. Amazon should refund this item -- I have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Steiner

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: My poor German Shepherd has been sick (puking and diarrhea) all week after purchasing this food for her on Amazon. Horrible experience. Won’t EVER buy again. Just praying my sweet girl will feel better soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think this is really Canidae. Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This food was not the same color as the store bought food. My dog has been eating this food for several years and I decided to try to get it for less from Amazon. Big mistake! They say the color may vary but this food made her sick. She had diarrhea the entire time she was on it. I think it is not the same food. I have heard stories about “knock offs” I am pretty positive this was one. As soon as I changed her food she had no more diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Food was rancid
customer_reviews.text: If you've read some of the other reviews, you'll notice some folks lamenting their dogs getting sick after eating rancid food. Unfortunately this happened to our toy poodle as well. As soon as we started him on his 2nd bag of canidae from Amazon he start getting diarrhea and had to go regularly, even in the middle of the night. We bought another bag from Pet Food Supply down the street. The kibble had a richer color and our poodle went back to eliminating like he used to with more solid stool. My gut (pun!) tells me their supply sits around for too long. You are better off buying from Chewy or at a local pet food store. Trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Gianny

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product that will harm your pet!
customer_reviews.text: Canidae is a great product and company, however I also received several bags that appear to be counterfeit that made my dogs extremely sick. Cancelled my auto delivery and went back to buying from the pet store and my dogs health returned. Amazon needs to address this! Dogs are getting sick! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C.

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it went up 20 bucks virtually over night
customer_reviews.text: Was great until it went up 20 bucks virtually over night... 44 lb.. was 53, now 73.. ive actually found for 48 via google now
customer_reviews.author: John Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and happy dog
customer_reviews.text: I switched our dog's food from Purina one over to Canidae, our dog has loved it from day one. One of the things we noticed, is that our dog's weight and digestion has become normal and were it should be at. With the previous food our dog would gain weight and constantly have issues when going potty. I highly recommend this product to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: pvgomer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have iron stomachs and are used to eating any type of dog food. In fact, they've previously eaten this food without issue. I bought this at what I thought was a good price. However, 3 out of 4 dogs have had severe diarrhea, despite me taking the time to slowly introduce this food into their routine. What's more disappointing is Amazon's refusal to accept returns of this terrible food. Given the other complaints, there is clearly something wrong with this product at the time of this writing.
customer_reviews.author: Earls

customer_reviews.title: Bag ripped, kibble missing
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this exact item dozens of times. This time, outside box fine. Dog food bag was placed inside a plastic bag (first time ever). Dog food bag torn, kibble spilled everywhere. 1/3 of kibble product missing (I know because we have a large Plastic bin that we transfer kibble too to keep it fresh. Barely filled halfway as opposed to almost to top). Tried to contact seller? Hope they contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Shlomo I

customer_reviews.title: Something's weird about this
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this food for my 3 dogs for over 6 months. I noticed my last bag was a little off. It looked like there was bird seed in my dog food. I thought it was strange and the I saw other reviews and now i know it shouldnt be that way. I'm not sure what is wrong but I am no longer ordering it from Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog is very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very happy with this product. I can not tell you how it tastes and the dog hates to write reviews. She does, however, devour her food now that we switched to this brand. I think she really likes it. There have been no problems with her digesting this and her energy is unchanged. I have recommended this to several friends who have dogs.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Recipe has definitely changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Canidae life stages through Amazon's subscribe and save for a few years. The last bag received has given my dogs gas that clears the house, oh my gosh! and there is absolutely corn in this food, despite the 'no corn' declaration. Just ordered a bag from a different dog food company so I can start switching them over now. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BBShiningwind

customer_reviews.title: Mom & Pup Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves Canidae so much! She recently turned 12, and I’ve switched her over to this formula for less active dogs. I’ve been trying to keep an eye on her weight since she’s getting older and corgis are notorious about getting heavy and having back problems in their senior years. Canidae has always been good to my dogs, I’ve never had allergy issues with it and both my dogs always have the most picture perfect poo when they eat it! I need to switch over to the canned as well, tbh, I can’t buy either close to where I live, so it’s great to set up on Amazon Subscription!
customer_reviews.author: Fluff n Stuff

customer_reviews.title: My dogs don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I did a taste test with this and Health Extension Grain Free Dry Dog Food - Salmon Recipe, 23.5lb. My dogs took the Salmon every time. Now, it is a little more expensive, but that's the only test I did, so this gets not such a good grade.
customer_reviews.author: Clagger

customer_reviews.title: Great find for a non-grain free option!
customer_reviews.text: Like many people concerned about the recent news of grain-free dog food, we wanted to find another brand that had quality ingredients at an affordable price. Both our miniature schnauzer and our standard peruvian inca orchid like this food just fine. And there's no awful gas reaction from my girl who doesn't tolerate some of the Blue Buffalo kibble without an awful reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Shiny new coat, white teeth, happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: We just switched from Costco food to this brand, hoping to give our German Shepherd a healthier diet. After a week of this food we noticed less plaque build up on his teeth and his breath isn't bad enough to clear a room anymore. We also noticed how incredibly soft and shiny his coat has become! In general he seems more satisfied/full after a serving of this vs his old food. Lastly, he didn't have any diarrhea/digestion issues during the switch. Will definitely stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: madison farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs seem to like this food a lot. It gives our boston the worst farts you could imagine but i would rather smell the farts knowing its good quality food than feed him cheap food. I wish they had a slightly bigger bag as this doesnt last exactly a month in our house, heeler and a boston. I think a 40-42lb bag would be ideal for 2 dogs under 50lbs. Thats my only gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Vandegriff

customer_reviews.title: Best For Bullies
customer_reviews.text: My dog is an english/old english bulldog and she is 10 years old. This food is easy on her digestion, and her coat looks amazing!! She is getting her winter coat now and I cannot believe how thick and shiny it is. She eats less of this food and is satisfied. Will never change her again! I got her Extend Pets supplement to sprinkle on her am food and that has helped her joints tremendously. I also got her VitaHealth Senior vitamins and that gives her an energy boost.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney H.

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this months, almost a year. It made my dog gain over 10 pounds. The last bag I just got this last month, the size and color of the food was different. My dogs wouldn’t eat it. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: All my dogs ( lab, chow, Boston, and Maltese) have been eating natural balance and blue basic for years with the grain free scare I decided to switch to Canidae All Stages. For a week my dogs have been eating the new food. So far so good no diarrhea. A plus with the new food it’s cheaper than what I was paying for the other dog foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Severe diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Gave my dog really bad diarrhea! Poor thing was suffering for a few days after eating this food
customer_reviews.author: Iriskaamerica

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Covered in chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! It came smelling of chemicals. One of my dogs barely ate a few bites and the other dog refused to eat any of it. Once I smelled it up close I realised this.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J

customer_reviews.title: Yellow Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My GSD has a highly sensitive stomach and we have tried so many different diets. This food had good reviews so we gave it a shot. He had yellow liquid diarrhea from it. We gradually added it to his food trying to do a show switch. One we reached half mixture the diarrhea started and got worse as we used more so we had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My puppy LOVEs this food!
customer_reviews.text: My puppies breeder recommended this specific dog food. I had never heard of it before but followed her direction for the sake of the my pup. I have zero regrets! My Nico loves this food. Plus, as it is all life stages, he won't have to get used to some other food in a few months or later as he ages. The vet had praise for this food as well. Good to know I am on the right path with my pup!
customer_reviews.author: KHWMI

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog food for my Pitbull! Not only is the shipment always delivered earlier than expected it has done wonders for my dogs appetite and stools. He’s now two years old and we tried two other well known brands prior to discovering this after a friend recommended it and it has since helped with his allergies and skin sensitivity as he was forming rashes and irritations while eating the previous brands as well as being caused to have soft or watery stools depending on the day. Since starting Canidae over the past 9 months I’ve seen a huge change in his allergies, stools and appetite. He loves this food and looks forward to his meals.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Last time I'll be buying this
customer_reviews.text: This last batch made my dog very sick and after $300 at the vet and a food change, she's finally back to normal. Thanks Canidae! I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: My dog threw it up twice and won’t even go near it. What a waste of $60.00. I hate the fact that there’s not a smaller size to see if your dog likes it. You’re forced to buy their big bag.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Food's okay, but the price JUMPED
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a bag of Canidae All life stages for $34.99 on sale last month. Went to order some more this month, and it it was $63!! The retail jumped almost $20 from what was listed the previous month. This is why I don't get attached to food and my dogs learn to adjust. Guts of steel.
customer_reviews.author: Liz in Indy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a dog food that was a puppy or All Life Stage food fora pup who would eventually grow above 70 pounds. This is high quality food that I was originally buying from Chewy but the price seemed like it was getting higher & higher, so I checked Amazon. Wow! What a difference!! We’re talking about a good $20-25 per bag! And when you have a Lab who’s already 68 pounds, this makes a HUGE difference! It’s on the subscription plan already. I’m very happy with Candidae; I’ve used it before and I’ve loved the results. Excellent dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Price gouge due to COVID
customer_reviews.text: So I have to buy this dog food because I have a dog that is allergic to chicken and beef. I bought this on February 12, 2020 for $19.99 and now because of the COVID crap it has snot up to $54. Ummm. What happened to no price gouging????
customer_reviews.author: chelsee dawson

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding my dogs this food for awhile. This new pack gave both of them diarrhea. I have to throw away the whole bag what a waste of money and food.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has tried almost all dry foods, including Canidae, and has never reacted like he did with this one. I have a bichon frise. He got super itchy, bloated with notable abdomen distention, farting like crazy, and changes in his fur. I’ve seen other reviews that there is a problem with the amazon version of Canidae. Several others complaining too. I had to throw out the whole bag after 2 weeks of having started it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly da Silva

customer_reviews.title: I will order again.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea I could order dog food online. Amazon. You did me a great favor. Im an elderly woman so handling large bags of dog food is next to impossible. Having it delivered to my front porch was perfect. This brand is recommrnded by the shelter where my dogs were adopted. The size pieces fit into their toys and are perfect fir small mouths. And the formla is healthy even for senior dogs. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: cabooklover

customer_reviews.title: Best dry dog food available.
customer_reviews.text: We always knew we were not feeding our dogs the 'best' dry dog food but could never really get a suggestion from the vet other than what they have in the office (mostly Hills Science). After boarding one of our dogs with a person we like to refer to as the "dog whisperer", she was appalled at the dry food we were feeding them (Iams); she has thoroughly researched and told us of this brand, completely made in the US. So we tried it and our dogs are happy and we are happier knowing we are feeding them better quality food for a fairly reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Constant diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding my dog Canidae dog food for the last two years. But with the last two bags of Canidae dog food, my dog had constant diarrhea. So I switched to different dog food and the diarrhea completely stopped. Hum... I wonder if the company switched recipes or the food went bad. Definitely, don’t recommend Canidae.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Rossbach

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: It is the same price as other places but free shipping is awesome. The size is great because other places do not always carry this size and I have gone to store to find the product sold out in this size. I will continue to buy this on Amazon as long as my dog is alive. She is a senior but full of energy. I changed to this food and she is smelling better, has more energy, regular, and doing well.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Food Ever
customer_reviews.text: Have fed this dog food for over 10 years to Golden Retrievers. Digestive and skin problems disappear! My last Golden lived to be almost 15 with practically no health problems. Have recommended to friends and family who also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this brand for one of my dogs that has liver issues. The other dog smells this dog food and no longer will eat her Nutro (which is aanother quality brand) food and only wants this brand of dog food. She literally isn’t eating unless I put a little of this dog food in her bowl and mix it. So I now am switching both dogs over. That’s got to tell you something right!
customer_reviews.author: Ponder This

customer_reviews.title: Not for my girl
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd Dog refuses to eat this dog food. She ate Taste of the Wild Bison, but will not eat this Canidae. We thought we could try something different for a change. Now I'm stuck with a 40lb bag of dog food and have to spend more money on something else. Not sure if issue is just this ONE BAG.....smell/or moldy. Or if it's the brand/flavor that she doesn't like. My girl LOVES to eat, so it was a surprise that she would NOT EAT this food.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: At her last vet checkup the doc took blood samples and the analysis came back extremely good for our dog's age (13 years)
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat it so I can't comment on taste but we fill our dog's bowl every night and in the morning it is all gone. We have been feeding our German Shepherd Dog Canidae All Life Stages for a number of years, we switched to the Platinum formula about a year and a half ago. At her last vet checkup the doc took blood samples and the analysis came back extremely good for our dog's age (13 years). We are stationed overseas, so the fact that this is an Amazon Prime product listing makes it easy for us to give our dog a consistent diet.
customer_reviews.author: Zef

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my 3 Pit Bulls for breakfast. I give another dog food for their dinner. Their coats are thick and shiny and their health is excellent. For the money I would rate this dog food as EXCELLENT! It is very well priced!
customer_reviews.author: Deb's

customer_reviews.title: Not the right food for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients read like a premium dog food, which I've always understood this brand to be, but my dogs have been upchucking almost daily since I transitioned them to this food. And, yes, I did slowly transition by adding in a little more each day, as I reduced the amount of the other food. I'm very disappointed because, again, the quality is good and the company seems to have pets best interests at heart. I would recommend you buy a smaller bag to try this product. If it works for your dog, you'll know it; if it doesn't, you won't be out that much cash.
customer_reviews.author: NC Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: My dog refuses to have this food after within two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients of this food may not be as fair as the description on the site. There are few negative things happen to my dog after two weeks: 1. My dog refuses to have this food only within two weeks, he is a young German Australian shepherd which usually won't be picky about his food. 2. His stool color turns light yellow which isn't normal as I'm aware for being his owner for more than a year. 3. He farts frequently with bad smell gas which may indicates this food contains ingredients not easy to digest for a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wu

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch or counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Canidae for over a year for our pet. Never had an issue, pet has enjoyed it, seemed like great food. This bag of food changed our pet. It made the dog lethargic, and generally sick to the point of throwing up her food, which she has never done. It also affected the quality of her coat and stool. Since switching to a different dog food pet has regained energy and health. I will never be buying Canidae or Taste of the Wild, which is owned by the same company, again. Quality control should be the number one priority with pet food, but that doesn't seem to be the case here.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Belle Royer

customer_reviews.title: we progressively moved up in quality on dog food - this seems like the best for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared for farts...lots and lots b/c of the probiotics...it goes away after a few bags and their digestive systems stabilize...we progressively moved up in quality on dog food - this seems like the best for our needs, three dogs, one almost 13 who acts like a young pup eating this! When you do the math against the nearest competition, this is actually cheaper per pound...and more pounds :) get some goodness in that pup and you'll both benefit!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Weak seal
customer_reviews.text: I normally would’ve wrote a really nice thing about Canidae. I don’t know if it’s safe to you because it’s open. It may have opened during shipping. Dog food this inside the box. I still think it’s a good product. It’s not happy with this purchase this time
customer_reviews.author: IHL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs don’t like it very much! It’s very expensive for the money! Not to happy! Sorry
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Dog stopped eating it after three months
customer_reviews.text: We made the transition in March. It's now July and the dog leaves the food for more than 12 hours. I changed bowls, nope. Gave him different food and he ate immediately. First attempt with this food, going to try with something else.
customer_reviews.author: W. W. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this food
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this food! This was recommended to us by a clerk at a local natural pet food store as being a high quality dog food. When we got our dog, he was an underweight 4 year old boxer. We fed him the puppy size portion of this food for several months and now he is a healthy size, his coat is gorgeous, and we have never had any issues with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Serena M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog food
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs: One is 6-lbs, picky, and 12-years old; the other is 1 year old, 15 lbs, and a furnace. Both love this food, which means we don’t need to serve different dry foods. Pooping has been fine as well, which means they’re processing efficiently with no excess waste or stomach upset. This is way more than Ol’ Roy, but worth it to the long term health of your dogs.
customer_reviews.author: George Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dogs with Sensitive Skin.
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs love this food. I have them trained to ring a bell when they're out of food. When we receive a new bag, I swear that the bell rings four or five times a night! I have a Bichon who's extremely sensitive to most store bought foods, they make her itch. We haven't had any sensitivity issues since switching to Canidae four years ago. I especially like that we receive this via Amazon subscription. My little doggies are never without their go-to food. If you find my review helpful, please indicate so by using the voting buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: I switched my dog to this food a while back because w/the other (will not name) store brand he would vomit almost daily. My daughter has her Pom's on this holistic food and they thrive, her eldest Pom was 20yrs old - my dog (Schnauzer) is doing great on this food. No more vomiting and he seems to be more active and not as blotted as he was! A plus in my book....
customer_reviews.author: Sherry G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this food. It is high quality at a good price (I use the subscribe and save program) and my dog loves it. I also like that since it is all life stages we are able to give it to her as a puppy and continue her on it as she gets older. I definitely intend to continue using this food and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HnDn0809Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: We don't buy any other brand!!
customer_reviews.text: We've fed this food to our Lab since we got her as a puppy and she has the shiniest, softest fur as a result. It may be a little pricier than other brands, but it's worthwhile to see her so healthy! She gobbles it up no matter what flavor we buy, so I'm going to give the flavor 5 stars as well.
customer_reviews.author: jamadoria

customer_reviews.title: Read ingredients on bag before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Information on website is not correct. The bag I received lists barley despite website stating lamb and rice is barley free under allergen information. I returned the bag and was immediately give credit. Date on bag: 3/2021
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Food varies bag to bag and gave my dog terrible GI issues
customer_reviews.text: The first bag purchased was totally fine, then every bag after had a different quality of food. The food looked different as well. Whatever is the issue was, it gave my dog awful intestinal issues. At first I thought it was something else, since switching him to this brand actually helped his GI issues since I used to TRUST Canidae, but once I switched off Candiae, he was fine again. Extremely disappointed as Canidae used to have a higher standard of dog food. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: unnamed

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs happy pack leader
customer_reviews.text: Gave this food a try based on reviews My hounds loved it will buy again. No adverse reactions from either one of my dogs... I've been trying to see if they're allergic to the food they have been eating. One of my dogs seems to shed hair and licks and chews his paws and joints.. the first bag added to their existing food so I can't say whether or not it has fixed this problem. I will add to my review Once they are completely switched over
customer_reviews.author: billy voldahl

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it - only initial digestive issues.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch to something more organic for my dog. She was always a slow eater and would pick at her food all day. When I gave her this, she loved it and finished it right away. Initially, it gave her bad gas and loose light colored stools, but after a few days she was fine. She loves this stuff so much and I feel better giving her this rather than something with preservatives and chemicals. I have a terrier/German shepherd mix
customer_reviews.author: S. Ter Horst

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My English Bulldog and Yorkie mix love this food! With our EBD she was getting lots of bumps under her chin due to a apparent allergy on her prior food. Since switching several months ago she is doing so much better. Good quality food for sensitive eaters or at least it works well with her makeup. For our yorkie mis it is a little large, so we just add warm water to soften it for him and he loves it as well. I would recommend this food!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn haga

customer_reviews.title: becareful
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product for the last 2 years and my dogs loved it. However the last 3 bags contained moldy food. I am not sure if I am going to continue ordering it. I am afraid it will harm my dogs. Not sure if the issue is on Amazons side or the food itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: stinky farts
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my dogs have very stinky farts from this food, so bad they got kicked out of the house, had to stop feeding it to them. After a day back to just their usual food, the stink went away (& yes I did integrate the food in small increments, as recommended by all who try a new food)
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: After a certain dog food brand named after a colorful plains animal started making my dogs very sicks, we went on a search for a quality dog food that didn't break the bank. After trying a couple different brands, we came to Canidae. With three dogs to feed, Canidae's 44 lb life stages became our number one choice. I can say that after a couple of years, we have been very pleased with the cost and quality of the food. Our dogs have been happy and healthy ever since the change. They run to eat each day and gobble it up. Definitely the best food for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford C. Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won't eat this and after catching a whiff of it I don't blame them. It smells like plastic and wet cardboard. One dog sniffed and walked away and the other dog took a bite then walked away. It has now become very expensive food for the wild rabbits that visit our backyard. Will definitely not be buying this supposed ultra premium brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Davis Steele

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, poop less too
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate the ingredient quality as I have no earthly idea whats in it. As for the flavor, I'm not going to eat it and my dog damn sure can't type. But I'd say the value for the money is definitely high. After years of feeding it I can say the dogs do well on it and process it quite well. Their droppings are similar to when on real raw diets.
customer_reviews.author: jesse james joslin

customer_reviews.title: THANKS SO MUCH FOR HAVING AVAILABLE FOR DELIVERY: ) ...
customer_reviews.text: THANKS SO MUCH FOR HAVING AVAILABLE FOR DELIVERY :) DISABLED/THIS IS 4 SERVICE DOG & HE LOVES IT BTW, HIS COAT/SKIN SHOW IT TOO, GLOWING WITH GR8 HEALTH. 5STARS
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this dry dog food. I have 4 dogs 3 of which are over 100 pounds i.e. Great Pyrenees, Irish Wolfhound, boxer mix, and a 44 lbs cattle herding dog. I have been giving the big dogs treats of the Canadae dry dog food. They love the flavor. They eat about a cup each for a snack. I wish I could afford to feed them Canadae entirely. I feed them a much cheaper Pedigree.
customer_reviews.author: Carol U.

customer_reviews.title: Something isn't right....
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will not eat this..... SOMETHING IS WRONG! MY DOGS ALWAYS EAT EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Usually great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this several times. Just bought a new bag and it had a hole in it. Dog food was all over inside the box. What a mess. I have a pittie. He has a sensitive stomach. He used to throw up quite a bit. I have changed his dog food several times with no success. I bought this dog food hoping for the best and it worked! He never throws up anymore. I just wish the bag was a little bigger considering the price but my dog seems to really like the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this food from Taste of the Wild for my pup that has been having yeast issues on his skin. Ever since I made the switch, his problems have been steadily improving. It is also a great value for such a large bag and if I ever get another pup, I won't have to worry about having 2 different types of food on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: Different product than past orders?
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this product line for six months without stomach upset or skin irritation. This order seems different; the color of the kibble is lighter and now he's having looser stools, as well as licking/chewing at this skin more. Nothing else in his routine/diet has changed, except for this new bag of food. I won't be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: This seems like great food, my dog really likes it and he is a very picky eater, so I consider it to be great. It comes in nice small little bites, so it seems pretty easy to eat/digest. It also has good ingredients. My only complaint is that the flavor I got (multi-protein formula) smells a lot like fish and gives my dog the WORST breath after he eats. It seems to go away with time after the meal though, so it works out.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive dogs
customer_reviews.text: I swear my dog has a dog version of IBS. Canidae has been perfect for him. We haven’t had any issues since he’s been on this brand. Now that he’s an older, fatter puppy, we now do the senior, and the vet said he’s losing weight and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Furtado

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food. Dogs are moving better and coats have improved
customer_reviews.text: I have some rather large older dogs and also a small Yorkie and they all love this food. Been subscribing and saving now for about 5 months. After a month or so the larger dog with the joint pain was moving better and there was a big improvement in the shine of all their coats. The dogs coats have a more of silky feel now. One dog that was older overweight did loose some weight. I see dog foods touting how much protein they have. This one has a little less which I'm certain is better for older less active dogs. Thumbs Up - 5 Star Product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Gobble it down
customer_reviews.text: My high energy adult dog would not eat the $70 a bag food I was buying him so decided to try this brand when it was delivered he was sniffing it, excited.. He ate it right away and last few days he has just been gobbling this down!! Very pleased with this food and my dog is even more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Mothra

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog's stomach upset
customer_reviews.text: Update: Just bought a bag from Petco and as you can see in photo, the top(left) one is the amazon one and the bottom(right) is the Petco one. The color, shape a size is off. I definitely think this is a knockoff, beware! I had been buying this product at the pet store for months with no issues. I bought this online here and all of a sudden my dog's stomach has been very upset with bad gas and soft stools. I'm suspicious this could be a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: This Bag Made my dogs SICK after the first bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand before but this bag made both of our dogs sick. Vomiting and Pooping in the house! I'm not sure what happened but I have a full bag of toxic food that I don't even want to put in the compost for fear of poisoning our garden.
customer_reviews.author: O'Brownton

customer_reviews.title: The Best Dog Food Without A Doubt
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog food I will feed my dog. He has been on it from the time he weaned onto solid food. It's top quality food without fillers and great for any age or breed dog. He is growing fabulous and is nice and muscular along with having a beautiful shiny coat. I always get compliments on his appearance everywhere that we go and I attribute it to this food. It is what I recommend to anyone with a dog. As he is a large breed dog I always go with the thirty pound bag and it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ca Buyer

customer_reviews.title: poor service- rec bad product... dont want to try again
customer_reviews.text: Ive heard great things about this dog food but for whatever reason ... when I get dog food from amazon my dog gets sick sometimes.. maybe its because they leave it in the sun.... unless you are there to get it! It sits there all day... instead of placing in a cool place... I wonder if they care to read a review .. that someone had there dog get sick... or something happened to someone due to there careless mistake....
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Great Dog food, transition from the old food to this food went great. Our dog seems to have more energy and less shedding. A little more expensive then the food we were using.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3OH

customer_reviews.title: This food made both my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Both of my dogs were very sick immediately after I began feeding them this food. Vomiting and diarrhea. Switched to another brand and they’ve been fine. Not only a waste of money, but I felt so bad knowing the food I chose to give them made them both so sick.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: He has been raised on Canide and all I can say is that he has become a smart and healthy boy
customer_reviews.text: Maxwell loves this food. He has been raised on Canide and all I can say is that he has become a smart and healthy boy. His coat is wonderful and he is always strong. More important, his output is always solid and .. well .. normal. Thats good! Max sometimes has bad farts, but since he has never had any other food (in general) I cannot blame this product for that .. he may just take after me and be gas filled no matter what ;-) The price is good for the quality of the ingredients. Let's hope Canidae keeps the product up and doesn't take any shortcuts as they grow. Love ordering this with Prime. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: WSymionowZ

customer_reviews.title: and they loved it up until recently
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this to my dogs for about 9 months, and they loved it up until recently. One of my dogs now refuses to touch it, which makes me believe that there is something going on with ingredient changes, quality control, etc.... whatever it is, I don't feel comfortable continuing to feed my dogs. I just switched dog foods, and now both of my dogs are happily eating again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcee Payne

product_meta.title: CANIDAE All Life Stages, Premium Dry Dog Food with Whole Grains
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Multi-Protein| Size:44 lbCANIDAE All Life Stages premium dry dog food is made with real food ingredients, formulated for all dogs. Our All Life Stages recipes makes mealtimes for multiple dog households simple. Every bag is vet formulated to meet the nutritional needs of dogs at every stage of their life, including senior dogs that may be less active. All Life Stages offers a protein-rich mix of premium ingredients like Chicken, Turkey, Lamb, or Fish paired with whole foods like potatoes, brown rice, peas, lentils, and cranberries. And we promise never any fillers – we’ve created All Life Stages without any corn, wheat or soy. Just a well-rounded meal crafted with their health and well-being at the forefront with the benefit of one bag for all! Our HealthPlus Solutions include added probiotics for easy digestion, vitamins/minerals and hard-working antioxidants for overall health and fatty acid blends for healthy skin and coat. With multiple flavors and formulations, there is a CANIDAE All Life Stages food that is perfect for your pup.
feature_bullets: OPTIMAL PROTEIN FOR ALL DOGS: All Life Stages is crafted from chicken, turkey, lamb, and fish meals providing an optimal level of nutrition for all breeds and sizes.
CREATED WITHOUT ANY WHEAT, CORN, or SOY: There’s nothing questionable in a bowl of Canidae All Life Stages.

HEALTHPLUS SOLUTIONS IN EVERY BITE: Probiotics added to every kibble after cooking to support healthy digestion, antioxidants to support a healthy immune system, and omega 6 & 3 fatty acids to support beautiful skin and coat.

FLAVORS & TYPES: With 5 different varieties there’s a Canidae All Life Stages product that your dogs will love.Lactating females may require 2-3 times the amount of food as an adult dog and they should be fed 3-4 times per day
WE MAKE PET FOOD SIMPLE: Canidae All Life Stages dog food uses simple, whole-food recipes made right here in our Texas facility. Because pet food shouldn’t be complicated.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
